Key Match Events: Shohei Ohtani hit a home run to tie the game and give the Dodgers life
Teoscar Hernández’s single brought home Ohtani and Betts to give the Dodgers a lead
Pre-Game Insights: Dodgers manager Dave Roberts emphasized the need to fight and throw the first punch
Freddie Freeman acknowledged that having Shohei Ohtani on the team always helps
Post-Match Reflections: Dodgers had a lead in a postseason game for the first time since Game 4 of the NLDS against the Padres
Dodgers had a lead at home for the first time since Game 2 of that series
Miscellaneous Highlights: Dodgers rallied twice from early deficits
Padres bombarded Yoshinobu Yamamoto in the first inning for three runs
